speed_limits.notes: Strictly enforced. School zones often 40 km/h.

rules.child_seat_rules: Strict standards (AS/NZS). Children under 7 detailed rules.
rules.phone_usage_rules: Prohibited holding phone. Smart cameras detect usage.
rules.priority_rules: Give way to right at unmarked intersections (rare). Roundabouts: give way to vehicles in roundabout.

tolls.notes: No cash booths. Must pay online or via tag within 3 days.

rules.parking_rules: Parallel parking must be in direction of travel.

motorcycle.lane_splitting_rules: Lane filtering allowed in most states at speeds < 30km/h (stopped traffic).

summary: Vast distances. Watch for wildlife (kangaroos) at dawn/dusk. Strict speed enforcement.
rental_and_idp_notes: English license accepted. Others need translation/IDP.
